goal.ch: 本課程主要介紹光學、雷射及輻射度學與光度學等基本原理，以及顯示器、LED、太陽光能與光纖通訊等光電應用領域的概況。透過本課程之學習將可使學生對光學與光學應用技術的基本原理與應用概況有初步的認識，並期許能將所學習之基本光學原理，應用在日後工作或生活中，以提升職場競爭力或創新應用能力。
goal.en: “In this course, we will introduce the concept of wave motion and the basic concept of laser, photometry, photons and light, the propagation of light, and the ray tracing software, and the basic principles of geometrical optics, as well as the overview of optoelectronic applications such as display, LED, solar energy, and optical fiber communication.“
